name: MiMi-Chan's Rampage
description:
Welcome to Neon Blood City, a hyper advanced metropolis that's also the siege of the corporation who created genetically engineered catgirls.
As Minerva, a former slave in a catgirl cafe, hack and slash your path through the streets and the police drones of Neon Blood in a blood thirsty revenge !

This project was developped within 8 weeks as part of a game dev formation by Technocité.

  • Game design / original concept : Louise Jungers
  • Game Art : Adrien Bouckaert, François Boudart
  • Programmation : Thomas Finet, Robin Roekens
  • Music : Jean-Philippe Emmanuel Mercier
